DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation of the use of resources and costs with O-arm in deep brain stimulation (DBS) surgeries and complex back surgeries
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of the Use of Resources and Costs
DOC.detailed_description: To measure the use of health resources in application A (with DBS) and in application B (vertebral fusions), in patients in the intervention group with O-arm and in the control group (usual care without O-arm) with the cost in each phase (pre-surgical, surgical, post-surgical and follow-up at 6 months (RAQUIS) and at 12 months (DBS))
